title: Survival run
creator_credit: Pyramid Films, Magus Films, Joaquin Padro and Robert Charlton
brief_description: Presents the determination and cooperation between a blind man (Harry Cordellos) and his sighted partner (Mike Restani) when they took on the grueling Dipsea cross-country race over the California mountains and through rain forests. “The Dipsea Race is like life. You don’t win it…you survive it.” Harry Cordellos.
